page.title: 15THE WHITE COTTAGE RESTURAUNT
page.content: THE WHITE COTTAGE RESTURAUNT WAS BUILT IN THE 16th CENTURY.THE OWNER OF THE WHITE COTTAGE HAS LIVED THERE FOR FOUR MONTHS SO SHE CAN'T JUDGE THE BUSINESS TOO WELL YET.HOWEVER,SHE DOES KNOW THAT THINGS ARE PICKING UP RAPIDLY.SHE HAS ABOUT THREE MEMBERS OF STAFF CONSISTING OF ONE FULL TIME AND ONE OR TWO PART TIME.THE RESTURAUNT HAS HAD A GOOD REPUTATION FOR A NUMBER OF YEARS.THE MENU IS VARIED WITH A WIDE CHOICE IN ALL COURSES.THE MEALS ARE WELL PRESENTED ALTHOUGH SOME DISHES ARE A LITTLE EXPENSIVE BUT THEN AGAIN YOU GET VALUE FOR MONEY. BEING ON THE MAIN A38 ALOT OF TRADE COMES FROM PASSING TRAFFIC.THEREFORE SUMMER TRADE IS USUALLY BUSY.
